headline: K&S ULTRA T SAWED WAFER CLEANING SYSTEM

specstable:
Manufacturer Kulicke & Soffa
Model 971 MicroWash
Description Sawed Wafer Cleaner
Accessories CO2 Reionizer (Eliminates the corona in the jet stream)
Wash Spin Speed Control
Dry Spin Speed Control

Other Information High pressure DI Water Spray
Infrared Heat Lamp for Drying
Upto 8" wafers, currently set for 6"
Power Requirements 115 V 5.0 A 50/60 Hz
Year of Manufacture 2002
